Creator: Commodore International, Commodore International, Commodore International

Name: IOS

Name: Classic Mac OS
Creator: Apple Inc.
Cost, availability: Discontinued; Was bundled with 68k and 68k Macs; versions 7-9 sold as retail upgrades68k

Name: MacOS
Creator: Apple Inc.
Cost, availability: Bundled with hardware; No-cost update via Mac App Store for users of Mac OS X 10.6 or later, assuming hardware requirements are met
Preferred Software licenseSoftware licen: Proprietary software higher level API layers; open source core system (Intel-PowerPC versions): Proprietary software, GNU GPL, others

Name: MacOS Server
Creator: Apple Inc.
Cost, availability: Previously bundled with hardware; No longer a separate operating system, but a group of services installed atop any current version of Mac OS X; US$19.99 on the Mac App Store
Preferred Software licenseSoftware licen: Proprietary software higher level API layers; open source core system (Intel-PowerPC versions): APSL, GNU GPL, others
